name: Crash 'N Burn
description:
Crash 'N Burn! Early Prototype

Some early progress toward an arcade game idea... For now, you just knock stuff around. I hope you enjoy my professional-grade artwork. Firefox is probably required!

The road seems to continue forever, but it actually loops, so you'll eventually run out of stuff to hit. If you want to, you can press 'R' to reset the course.

Controls - Left + Right Arrow Keys steer the car

Debug keys - R: Reset course; Scroll wheel: increase/decrease speed, or even make the car go backwards! (which causes bugs, but is amusing)...

(c) 2016 Colin Jones
